game:dialogue-buyelk-called: Alright, check outside, they should be nearby.
game:dialogue-buyelk-callelk-thanks: Thanks, I'll take care of them.
game:dialogue-buyelk-purchased: A pleasure doing business with you. Now, let me call them to us!
game:dialogue-treasurehunter-ihaveanelk: I have an elk I could part with. They would be a loyal companion to you on your journey. As thanks for your information, I'll part with them for only 100 gears. You'll need a saddle and bridle, too.
